* [City Council](https://www.pearlandtx.gov/government/city-council)

The City is diligently working to improve the quality of life in Pearland. City staff works directly with the Council and other boards and commissions to ensure the goals of the city are being met. Below is some information you may find useful.
Administration
Meet your City Manager and other Executive staff.

[City Council](https://www.pearlandtx.gov/government/city-council)
Get to know your Pearland mayor and councilmembers.

[City Elections](https://www.pearlandtx.gov/departments/city-hall/election)
Find general election and candidate information.
Agendas, Meeting Video and Minutes
View the city's meeting agendas and other public documents.

Boards & Commissions
Read about the city's many boards, commissions and committees, who currently serves and how to apply.

Organizational Values
Find out what the City's Core Values are.

Municipal Code
Search and browse the city's municipal code and city ordinances via Municode.

NCS Survey Results
View the City's National Citizen Survey Results.
